item.description:
Calling entrepreneurs and strategic visionaries to an informal brainstorm session with IBM's East Region Executive for Social and Interactive Media, Jacob Wood.

Topic:
What could you do with mobile video holography?

Description:
IBM's research team is interested in the potential applications of technology that allows your mobile phone to project a 3D holographic image from the palm of your hand. How could new or existing businesses leverage this technology? What applications exist for users? 3D video conferencing, gaming, ...?

For more background, read Information Week's coverage.

Whether you can make it or not, participate in the ongoing discussion on our ideas page.

Note:
This event will be limited to 10 participants and preference will be given to entrepreneurs, those involved in the discussion page above, or those with some experience in social/interactive media and/or introducing new technologies to market.

Please only sign-up if you can make it as we're reserving space accordingly. Also, do encourage any non-members who you think would be interested to sign-up.
item.name: Mobile Video Holography Brainstorm with IBM's Jacob Wood
